data.title: Songs about Drums & Drummers
data.meta_description: Ginger Baker, who helped to bring drums into the spotlight of rock music as a member of Cream and Blind Faith, passed awa
data.text:
Ginger Baker, who helped to bring drums into the spotlight of rock music as a member of Cream and Blind Faith, passed away yesterday at the age of 80. We'll include his music in the mix along with your requests for songs that mention drums and drummers. Share your favorites and we'll bang out a set after 9am.

Here's what we played:

Florence + The Machine "Drumming Song"

The Ting Tings "Great DJ"

Richard Shindell "Arrowhead"

Citizen Cope "Let the Drummer Kick"

+

Cream "What a Bringdown"
